title: Remove One: Champion, Item, Rune, Summoner Spell
body:
Champion: {{champion:40}} pretty simple she is just cancer and she has way to low of a skill floor. She is too good in solo q.

Item: {{item:3124}} phantom hits are imbalanced and have been through every iteration in this game. They need to be removed from the game and never revisited.

Rune: Unsealed Spellbook, it is just not healthy for the game. Summoners are already pretty insane, but having them on a lower cooldown and just switching between them consistently is not fun or halthy.

Summoner Spell: {{summoner:12}} has so many problems. Yes it is not a combat summoner, but it is the most effective summoner to lane with. It is a free back and a free exp and or item lead. It also allows for insane map pressure without having to think about rotating. It is too effective at too many things. I never see it being balanced and feeling good at the same time.

What are your guys' choices? What do you think about mine? Would love to discuss.

I would remove flash summoner spell and either make it a keystone or an item. It's currently mandatory on immobile champions, while making mobile ones even harder to deal with than they already are. I cannot count how many times someone has gotten away from something they shouldn't have due to flash. An ability as powerful as flash should come at a cost, which it doesn't really, especially if the champion is mobile.

I would also combine ghost and cleanse, as you really do have to make sacrifices for these summoner spells. Adding the cleanse effect to ghost would make it much more attractive, especially to immobile melees, who are naturally prone to kiting.
